item.title: How to Install MX Linux Duall Boot with Windows 10
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install MX Linux with Windows 10 in Dual Boot. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the MX Linux ISO. You need install Windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! Links MX Linux - Download Steps 1. Prepare Windows 10 I will shrink the disk space about 30 Gb to install MX Linux.
